subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Omar Infante’s bases-loaded single off Brad Lidge capped a ninth-inning rally and lifted the host Atlanta Braves to a 4-3 victory over the Philadelphia Phillies on Saturday.
snippet: Omar Infante’s bases-loaded single off Brad Lidge capped a ninth-inning rally and lifted the host Atlanta Braves to a 4-3 victory over the Philadelphia Phillies on Saturday.
